mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_school_setting ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, school_name, type, start_date, end_date, parameters) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{schoolName}, #{type}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{parameters});
mapper.update: UPDATE b_school_setting SET gmt_modify = now(), type = #{type}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, parameters = #{parameters} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, school_name AS schoolName, type, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, parameters FROM b_school_setting ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;
SELECT id, school_name AS schoolName, type, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, parameters FROM b_school_setting WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT id, school_name AS schoolName, type, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, parameters FROM b_school_setting WHERE school_name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR};
